Producer: Brett Ratner, John Cheng, Sukee Chew, Vanessa Coifman, Ted Hartley
Rating: PG-13 (Language|Drug References|Sexual Material|Some Action Violence|Teen Drinking)
Synopsis: Seeking a normal adolescence, a special-operations agent (Hailee Steinfeld) fakes her own death and enrolls in high school as an exchange student.
Title: Barely Lethal
